code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CreateArea(props){const[blog,setBlog]=useState({title:"",content:"",theme:"",description:""});function handleChange(event){const{name,value}=event.target;setBlog(prevBlog=>{return{...prevBlog,[name]:value};});}function submitBlog(event){props.onAdd(blog);setBlog({title:"",content:"",theme:"",description:""});event.preventDefault();}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"title",onChange:handleChange,value:blog.title,placeholder:"Theme"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"content",onChange:handleChange,value:blog.content,placeholder:"Take a blog note...",rows:"3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"theme",onChange:handleChange,value:blog.theme,placeholder:"Write your title",rows:"2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"description",onChange:handleChange,value:blog.description,placeholder:"Write your description",rows:"2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:submitBlog,children:"+"})]})});}export default CreateArea;
